column1: The Pit Room////We had the brisket dinner and chicken dinner options
column2: with an added pulled pork taco. Both dinners came with two sides. The brisket was perfect. Nice smoke flavor
column5: just like it should be. The chicken was also delicious. Nice crust on the skin and great smoke flavor. Likely one of the best smoked chickens around. The sides were mac n cheese
column6: which was delicious and very cheesy. The beans had a wonderful spice level to them. The dining room has an area to grab a variety of sauces
column8: fresh jalape√±os and pickled veggies to accompany your meal. The pulled pork taco is a must have! Overall a great spot to get some really good bbq!!
